We've been waiting for you.{F801}{F802}The Tournament is going to begin soon.{F801}{F802}I'm sure you've heard this before:{F801}"Winning and losing is the difference{F801}between Heaven and Hell here."{F801}{F802}Are you ready?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406001}Thank you for your patience,{F801}ladies and gentlemen!{F801}{F802}The Fifteenth Grand Tokyo Hunter{F801}Tournament shall now commence!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406001}Thank you for your patience,{F801}ladies and gentlemen!{F801}{F802}The Fifteenth Grand Tokyo Hunter{F801}Tournament shall now commence!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0And now, for the first match of the{F801}night, here is the first challenger.{F801}{F802}The Ueno district's representative,{F801}the Hunter Samurai, {F843,0}!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Announcer\0And now, for the first match of the{F801}night, here is the first challenger.{F801}{F802}The Ueno district's representative,{F801}the Hunter Samurai, {F843,0}!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0And here is his opponent!{F801}{F802}Uh-oh, he's going up against one of{F801}our most legendarily bloodthirsty{F801}Hunters in the first round!{F801}{F802}The representative from the{F801}Ikebukuro district, Prisoner Yokota!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406003}All Hunters are a little off, but{F801}this next one seems positively normal{F801}compared to the others!{F801}{F802}Honestly, folks, I have no idea why{F801}he would ever want to take part in{F801}this cavalcade of psychotics.{F801}{F802}The representative of the Shibuya{F801}district, this veteran Hunter{F801}wields the power of the gods!{F801}{F802}I present to you: Master Hiro Jingu!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0I never expected to see this! The{F801}former champ is in desperate straits.{F801}{F802}Let's see how {F843,0} takes his{F801}crown to become the ultimate victor.{F801}{F802}Now then, what will {F843,0} do!?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Rabid spectator\0What!? This is the final round!{F801}You're not even gonna kill him!?{F801}You're no champion! I'm outta here!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Rabid spectator\0What!? This is the final round!{F801}You're not even gonna kill him!?{F801}You're no champion! I'm outta here!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406003}Amazing! Shame that we couldn't get{F801}some blood flowing around here...{F801}{F802}...But the new champion, {F843,0},{F801}shows respect for his predecessor{F801}and lets him live!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406003}Amazing! Shame that we couldn't get{F801}some blood flowing around here...{F801}{F802}...But the new champion, {F843,0},{F801}shows respect for his predecessor{F801}and lets him live!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406002}What ruthlessness! A true warrior,{F801}without an ounce of compassion!{F801}{F802}But, that's okay! We're all crazy{F801}here! Listen to that crowd cheer!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406004}Now then, ladies and gentlemen!{F801}{F802}Let me present the Fifteenth Grand{F801}Tokyo Hunter Tournament champion...{F801}{F802}{F843,0}!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0Know this, {F843,0}! Everybody's{F801}going to look at you differently{F801}now.{F801}{F802}You know why? Because you're the{F801}Hunter who won this crazy tournament!{F801}{F802}Not only will people expect more{F801}from you, {F843,0}, but we're going{F801}to be watching your career closely.{F801}{F802}To everybody else: keep your eyes{F801}on {F843,0}'s Hunter ranking from{F801}now on!{F801}{F802}This concludes the Fifteenth Grand{F801}Tokyo Hunter Tournament!{F801}
